TopicTitle: Mk5H Nose Cone somehow started acting as ground anchor after hard landing.

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.5 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 11 | CPU: AMD Ryzen 5 5600 6-core Processor | GPU: NVIDEA GeForce RTX 3060 | RAM: 15.91GB

 

I was doing a somewhat crash landing and the top of the vessel was bouncing around, when it suddenly just stopped moving and was stuck in that position.
At the end of the video you see me going to timewarp 0x. That is a demonstration of what roughly happened, only the real one wasn't timewarp 0x...

Reproduction:
I haven't managed to do so, because it's practically impossible to intentionally hit the ground in such an odd way

Edit: To add on this, the airbrakes also didn't work during this anchored state. After closing the PAM the bug seemed to go away
